data.strFullDescription:
Download the Wormtown Friend's Pass and play Last Train Outta' Wormtown with your friends for free!

This version of Wormtown allows joining private games hosted by players who own the full copy of Wormtown.

How it works:
[list][*]Simply download the Wormtown Friend's Pass
[*]Join your friend using their lobby code
[*]Have fun![/list]

If you enjoy the game, consider picking up your own copy to unlock the full features of the game, like:
- Additional cosmetic and player customization options
- Hosting your own games or joining public Quickplay lobbies
- Player progression and Steam Achievements (Coming Soon!)
data.strSnippet: Download the Wormtown Friend's Pass and play Last Train Outta' Wormtown with your friends for free!
